duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading, evaluating, and tracking in-store repair services activities performed at the request of Stores and field leaders.
Serving as a universal point-of-contact for vendors, stores, and other stakeholders for all project-related details, ensuring a high degree of accuracy and customer service.
Executing, tracking, and reconciling work order priority levels and repair types to ensure proper financial tracking.
Leading the annual Store refurbishment process, creating and maintaining repair team process documentation, and training new department associates.
Responding quickly to ad hoc inquiries, designing solutions for complex repair needs, and assisting with a wide range of analytical tasks in a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred with 2-4 years of experience, ideally in a project management role.
